thread.title: HTC U Ultra at Rs 59,990, U Play at Rs 39,990 launched in India | Zee News
thread.title_full: HTC U Ultra at Rs 59,990, U Play at Rs 39,990 launched in India | Zee News

title: HTC U Ultra at Rs 59,990, U Play at Rs 39,990 launched in India | Zee News

organizations.name: black oil and cosmic pink gold

text:
HTC U Ultra at Rs 59,990, U Play at Rs 39,990 launched in India By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 18:30 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Taiwanese smartphone maker HTC Corporation on Tuesday launched HTC U Ultra and HTC U Play devices. 
The HTC U Ultra has been priced at Rs 59,990 and the U Play has been priced at Rs 39,990. 

â€” HTC India (@HTC_IN) February 21, 2017 
Both the devices come with 3D-contoured, liquid-adaptive HTC U sonic technology for personalised hearing experience and a unique combination of MegaPixel and UltraPixel camera technology on the front to provide vivid light, colour and detail. 
The HTC U Ultra comes equipped with the dual display, HTC Sense companion, U Sonic and Voice recognition. The device has 16MP UltraPixel camera in the front and 12MP UltraPixel main camera. 
HTC U Ultra and U Play comes in 64GB memory variant. 
The HTC U Play with a 5.2-inch display and is available in Iceberg White, Indigo Blue, Black Oil and Cosmic Pink Gold colours. 
The devices come with a one-year insurance that covers liquid damage and any physical damage to the phones. 
First Published: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 18:30 More from zeenews
